import {useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; function App() { const [weather, setWeather]= useState([]) const[search, setSearch] = useState([]) const searchPressed = ()=>{ fetch(`https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${search}&appid=739fa4921f5e1da27fc5d65fd70a2bed`) .then(res=>res.json()) .then((data)=>setWeather(data)) } const temp1 = weather.main.temp; const tempMax = weather.main.temp_max; const tempMin = weather.main.temp_min; console.log(weather); return (
